00113 {
00114    static unsigned char channel = 0;
00115    static unsigned long value;
00116    static unsigned char cnt = 0;
00117    unsigned char i;
00118    float t;
00119 
00120    if (cnt == 0) {
00121       /* switch between channels 0 and 4 */
00122       channel = channel == 0 ? 5 : 0;
00123       AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00124       ADC0CF = 0xE0 | (GAIN & 0x07);    // 16 system clocks and gain
00125 
00126       value = 0;
00127    }
00128 
00129    /* integrate 16 times */
00130    for (i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
00131       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00132 
00133       ADCINT = 0;
00134       ADBUSY = 1;
00135       while (!ADCINT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00136 
00137       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00138 
00139       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00140       yield();
00141    }
00142 
00143    cnt++;
00144 
00145    if (cnt == 0) {              /* average 16*256 = 4096 times */
00146       value /= 256;
00147 
00148       /* convert to volts, times 100deg/Volt */
00149       t = value / 65536.0 * 2.5 * 100;
00150 
00151       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00152       if (channel == 0)
00153          user_data.temp[0] = t;
00154       else
00155          user_data.temp[1] = t;
00156       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00157    }
00158 }
